HallOfFame.Common.BASE_ERROR: Hall of Fame has encountered an unexpected error. Please report the problem to the mod author on Paradox Mods/Forum or via Discord/GitHub (@toverux).
HallOfFame.Common.RECOVERABLE_ERROR: The error is recoverable and you should be able to ignore and continue to play.
HallOfFame.Common.FATAL_ERROR: The error is fatal and can have unintended side effects, recommend to save and restart the game and disable the mod if this repeats.
HallOfFame.Common.ERROR_MESSAGE[HallOfFa: Our server couldn’t be reached. Please check your internet connection, if it’s working, it’s likely a temporary issue on our side. Error details: {ERROR_MESSAGE}
It seems like our server is having issues. Please try again later. Error details: {ERROR_MESSAGE}
The version of Hall of Fame you have is incompatible with the server. Please verify that the mod is up to date.
We failed to download the image. Error details: {ERROR_MESSAGE}
HallOfFame.Settings.PARADOX_LOGIN_DIALOG: Welcome to Hall of Fame! But…

You are not logged in with a Paradox account.
This means that Hall of Fame will use a local Creator ID for your account, that will need to be manually imported in other machines.
If you want to fix that, login with Paradox, close the game, and remove your Creator ID in the mod’s settings file.
HallOfFame.Systems.CommonUI.OPEN_PDX_MOD: Do you prefer opening Paradox Mods links in game, or in your default browser?
HallOfFame.Systems.CaptureUI.SET_CREATOR: Hello there! To be able to upload a picture, you must first choose a Creator Name in the mod settings.

HallOfFame.Systems.PresenterUI.CONFIRM_R:
You may report this screenshot to our moderation team if it (or its text descriptions) contains offensive content, if the image is not from the game, or extremely low quality images where it is clear that the intention of the author was not to share their work.
For other reasons that are not obvious, please contact the author of the mod and explain the situation.
HallOfFame.Systems.PresenterUI.REPORT_SU:
Your report was sent and the screenshot is unlisted pending review.
Thank you for helping us keep the Hall of Fame a nice place!
HallOfFame.UI.Menu.MenuControls.COULD_NO: Hall of Fame’s had a little network traffic accident :'(
HallOfFame.UI.Menu.MenuControls.GAMEPLAY: Gameplay is not affected and it is absolutely safe to launch a game.

Menu.NOTIFICATION_DESCRIPTION[HallOfFame: You’ve posted {SCREENSHOTS_COUNT} image(s), and got {LIKES_COUNT} likes for {VIEWS_COUNT} views!
Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod: Click “{KEY=Common.ACTION[Show Advanced]}” for more customization options!
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[HallOfFame.Ha:
Your Creator Name, will be displayed alongside your screenshots.
You can change it anytime as long as your Creator ID stays the same, your name will be updated on the server immediately and for all past uploads as well.

Unique and SECRET Creator ID, used to authenticate you and regroup your works.
Do NOT share it! Think of it as a password.
You can edit it in the settings file if you know what you’re doing.
Contact the support if you have a problem with your Creator ID.
This is your account status with the Hall of Fame server.

Copy your Creator ID to the clipboard.
<Keep it private> — only share it with Hall of Fame’s author for support, or with trusted third-party services that integrate with Hall of Fame.
You can disable Hall of Fame’s slideshow on the main menu and still keep the other features.

If <{KEY=Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod.Settings.EnableMainMenuSlideshow]}> is disabled, you may use this hotkey to load Hall of Fame on-demand.
This is useful for people who don’t want this part of the mod enabled at all times, or people who have crash issues when too much mods load on startup.
Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod: Show latest image on the loading screen
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[HallOfFame.Ha: Whether Hall of Fame will show the last image it loaded on the loading screen when loading a save or returning to the main menu.
When viewing screenshots, show buttons for the creator’s social media accounts.

When viewing screenshots, show the number of views a screenshot has received in the screenshot labels (along the city milestone, population, etc).
Note that if you often see the same number, it’s just because of the algorithms that try to balance views across low view screenshots.

Translation mode for non-Latin creator and city names (ex. Chinese, Russian, etc).
Names that match your game language will not be transformed (ex. a Chinese person will see Chinese text untranslated).
Translations are automated, so errors can happen. They can be fixed on request.
<{KEY=Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod.Settings.TranslationMode.Translate]}> attempts to give a translation of the city/creator name in english (actual translation or phonetic), but it can make more mistakes.
<{KEY=Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod.Settings.TranslationMode.Transliterate]}> displays a transliteration in roman characters without any translation. This is less likely to contain mistakes.
<{KEY=Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod.Settings.TranslationMode.Disabled]}> will show the original names.
Keyboard shortcut to show the previous screenshot.
Keyboard shortcut to show a new screenshot.
Keyboard shortcut for toggling the main menu UI visibility.
Keyboard shortcut for liking a screenshot.
Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod: Adjust the weights below to change the likelihood of each algorithm being selected to show a screenshot (see the sliders’ description for details).
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[HallOfFame.Ha: Popular screenshots that have a higher number of likes per day.

Recently posted screenshots (a few days old at most).
We recommend not setting it to zero to give new creators and creations a chance!

Screenshots with the fewest views, oldest first.
We recommend not setting it to zero so that no city falls into oblivion!
Screenshots chosen completely at random!

Screenshots from valuable community members who, in one way or the other, provided a lot of help, feedback, support and enthusiasm <3
Thanks go to: b00tyaddict, CloverPie, Danil.V.L, Hendrix, Jason_Stephen, Jojodaisuke, Konsi, obelix, Prophedt, TheBusStop, ThemisC2, Tigon Ologdring.
Options.OPTION[HallOfFame.HallOfFame.Mod: Minimum time before a screenshot may be shown again (in days)
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[HallOfFame.Ha:
Minimum time before you may see a screenshot you’ve already seen.
However, due to performance reasons, if you see a lot of screenshots, this preference is not guaranteed to be always honored.

Resolution of the images shown by Hall of Fame.
The mod always takes a 4K+ image regardless of the actual resolution used by the person sending an image (supersampling).
This way, you can choose the resolution at which you want to view the images.
Use 4K if you have a screen better than 1920×1080, or want better image quality, and if you’re not short on bandwidth or even RAM.
Folder where images you download from the main menu will be saved to.

Save a copy of the screenshot made with Hall of Fame in the game’s screenshot folder.
Contrarily to the game’s screenshots, these will be in 4K+ resolution.

<{KEY=Options.OPTION[SSGIQualitySettings]}> is a graphics setting that is known to be quite buggy in C:S 2 with Nvidia graphics cards, producing images with a lot of grain and artifacts.
With this checked, it will be disabled just for the time a screenshot is taken, and will be immediately re-enabled if it was enabled before that.
If you are *sure* that <{KEY=Options.OPTION[SSGIQualitySettings]}> works fine for you, you can uncheck this option to have the best quality screenshots.

Address of the Hall of Fame server. You should not change it unless you’re developing on the mod or using an alternative server.
You can use “test.halloffame.cs2.mtq.io” to test the mod on a sandbox database.
Reset all mod settings to their default values (except the Creator ID which will be kept untouched).

This is an invite link to join the Cities: Skylines Modding Discord server, for support requests and chatting.
The preferred channel is pdxm-mods-published › Hall of Fame.
Opens <discord.gg/HTav7ARPs2>

Hall of Fame has monthly costs for server and image storage.
To make the mod viable in the long term for me, donations are greatly appreciated!
Any donation ≥ $10 (or an approximation in your currency) will grant you the “Supporter” status (leave a message with your Creator Name when donating), which will slightly increase your view count.
This is a PayPal link; you can also find me on Ko-fi: <ko-fi.com/toverux>
